va-special-disability-benefits.title: Additional Disability Benefits for Veterans
va-special-disability-benefits.headline: Additional Disability Benefits for Veterans
va-special-disability-benefits.summary: If you have a disability related to your military service that prevents you from driving, you may be able to get adaptive-equipment grants to change your vehicle or assistance to buy specially equipped vehicle.
va-special-disability-benefits.eligibili: You served in the active military, naval or air service.
discharged under conditions other than dishonorable
a member of the National Guard or Reserves
